channel.title: Episodes on My New Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content in Episodes on My New Hugo Site

item.title: Episode 05 — Max Cooper
item.description: In this conversation Max Cooper — producer and visual-music collaborator — discusses his musical journey from his early days in Northern Ireland through academic research and experimental approaches to sound, sharing how eclectic influences shaped his philosophy and practice.

item.title: Episode 04 — Paul White
item.description: In this episode Paul White reflects on his journey from the British beats scene and sampling heritage to traditional songwriting and broad artistic influences, discussing his evolution and creative philosophy.

item.title: Episode 03 — Mala
item.description: In this conversation, Mala — DJ, producer, promoter, and co‑founder of Digital Mystikz — explores his early influences from jungle and dub to club culture, discussing the evolution of dubstep, the role of Deep Medi, and how his sound has developed over time.

item.title: Episode 02 — Kenton Slash Demon
item.description: In this episode, Silas Moldenhawer of Kenton Slash Demon discusses the duo’s origins, their early musical influences, approaches to sampling, the Copenhagen scene, and how remixes and collaborators shaped their work.

item.title: Episode 01 — Shigeto
item.description: In this episode, Zach ‘Shigeto’ Saginaw reflects on his musical beginnings — from Ann Arbor to Detroit — discussing how jazz, electronic music, and local scenes shaped his sound.
